customize.name: Beryl Conch
customize.desc: A conch-like structure that gives off a faint glow. Despite the name, it is not a shell but something condensed from pure elemental energy.

customize.name: Strange Part
customize.desc:
A strange mechanical part obtained near Merusea Village. It looks subtly different from common mechanical parts.

You have no idea why it ended up here, but beautiful metal products like this are loved by Melusines...

customize.name: Romaritime Flower
customize.desc: An ethereal and elegant blue flower. Its tender petals are elastic and water-absorbent, making it the ideal raw material for various daily necessities.

customize.name: Strange Part
customize.desc:
A strange mechanical part obtained near Merusea Village. It looks subtly different from common mechanical parts.

You have no idea why it ended up here, but beautiful metal products like this are loved by Melusines...

customize.name: Transoceanic Pearl
customize.desc:
A small crystal obtained from a defeated Fontemer Aberrant.

Fontemer Aberrants arise from Fontaine's sea. They are believed to be a unique life form born from the mysterious energy in the water.

customize.name: Strange Part
customize.desc:
A strange mechanical part obtained near Merusea Village. It looks subtly different from common mechanical parts.

You have no idea why it ended up here, but beautiful metal products like this are loved by Melusines...

customize.name: Meshing Gear
customize.desc:
Clockwork meka's gear.

It is a crucial part of the meka's transmission structure. The whole system will malfunction if this gear is absent.

customize.name: Strange Part
customize.desc:

customize.name: Rift Core
customize.desc:
A shard left by Breacher Primus.

It bears no resemblance to any other known form of life in the world.

customize.name: Strange Part
customize.desc:
A strange mechanical part obtained near Merusea Village. It looks subtly different from common mechanical parts.

You have no idea why it ended up here, but beautiful metal products like this are loved by Melusines...

customize.name: Guide to Equity
customize.desc:
The shore of the Nation of Water is equity.

Equity is the foundation upon which Fontaine was founded. Equity forms the standard of the law. If law loses the essence of equity, it will become a chessboard played for profit.

customize.name: Strange Part
customize.desc:
A strange mechanical part obtained near Merusea Village. It looks subtly different from common mechanical parts.

You have no idea why it ended up here, but beautiful metal products like this are loved by Melusines...

customize.name: Enigmatic Page (XIII)
customize.desc:
An ancient paper whose contents are completely unintelligible.

Perhaps there's some way to decipher the contents.

voice.title: Shinies...
voice.desc: If only I could get my hands on more shinies...
